sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const Discriptions = () => { return ( <>
{/* Section Title */}

How You Can Learn የመማር መንገድ

{/* Description */}

Learn at your own pace — whether you're using a **phone** or a **computer**. በስልክ ወይም በኮምፒዩተር በማንኛውም ጊዜ እና በራስዎ ፍጥነት ይማሩ።

{/* Learning Cards */}
{/* Web Development */}

🌐 Web Development

English: Practice by building small projects and hosting them online. Use online editors (CodePen, Replit) or install VS Code on PC.

Amharic: ትንሽ ፕሮጀክቶች በመፍጠር እና በመስመር ላይ በመስቀል ይለማመዱ። የመስመር ላይ ኤዲተሮች (CodePen, Replit) ወይም በኮምፒዩተር VS Code በመጠቀም ይማሩ።

{/* Graphics Design */}

🎨 Graphics Design

English: Use mobile apps like Canva or Adobe Express for design practice. On PC, explore Photoshop, Illustrator, or Figma.

Amharic: በስልክ Canva ወይም Adobe Express በመጠቀም ይለማመዱ። በኮምፒዩተር Photoshop፣ Illustrator ወይም Figma ይሞክሩ።

{/* Other Courses */}

📚 Other Skills

English: For any other course, find related free tools online. Practice regularly and join community forums for help.

Amharic: ለሌሎች ትምህርቶች ተዛማጅ ነጻ መሳሪያዎችን በመስመር ላይ ይፈልጉ። በተደጋጋሚ በመልማመድ እና በማህበረሰብ ፎረሞች በመቀላቀል ይማሩ።

) } export default Discriptions
